column5: Seems like a small step but sounds encouraging nonetheless:  http://www.thespec.com/news-story/6366217-watching-the-walleye-in-hamilton-harbour/
It is a start. Hamilton Harbour has come a long way. There is still much work to be done. Let's hope these fish find suitable habitat to spawn.
Lets hope the flocks of Cormorants don't make this a disaster instead.
Great news. Its  great to see our waters recovering in such a positive way.
Turn that frown upside down.  Hahahaha.  Sometimes you just have to be happy about a little bit of promising news.
